title: Crazy Clippers Comeback, Sixers Force Game 7 and What Does The Kemba Trade Mean? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by J. Kyle Mann to talk about the Clippers' comeback against the Jazz (1:00) and the Sixers forcing a game 7 against the Hawks (14:07). Then they discuss the Kemba Walker trade and what it means (48:17).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and J. Kyle Mann
Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
